name: Spiritchaser
description:
Fight your way into the depths of the dungeon and back again to return your stolen soul and save your life. 

As punishment for entering the dungeon with the intention of stealing its treasure, the Dungeon Keeper killed you. But there is one last hope of survival. Reach the end of the dungeon where your soul is being kept and return it, all while battling hoards of enemies and loosing a life each room, all before you become completely disconnected from your body and become a lost soul forever. 

Seems impossible? 

What other choice do you have.

-- Controls --

  • WASD to move
  • Space or Q to attack
  • F to toggle fullscreen on and off

-- Features --

  • Wizards, bats, zombies, and ghosts
  • Spikes and lasers
  • 10 levels
  • 4 different areas
  • Sword that can deflect bullets
  • Healables
  • Start with 10 lives and lose one max life each room
